about_the_game:
Sephiria is a top-down action rogue-lite game with pixel graphics.

Players take on the role of a rabbit in the village at the top of the tower and must change the fate of the tower from destruction.

Go down the tower, meet various animals, and collect various artifacts and tablets to become stronger.

That is the only way to prevent destruction.



[Main Features]

- Top-down action game with fast and intuitive controls: Sweep and attack many enemies, block their attacks, and immerse yourself in a fast-paced action game.

- Cute pixel graphics: Explore a world made up of beautiful pixel art.

- Your own build: Become stronger by collecting artifacts that provide special effects just by acquiring them and tablets that enhance the effects of adjacent artifacts.

- Various interactive elements: Talk, ask for favors, and trade with the animals you meet in the game. They can be allies or enemies.
